title: Nurse-led intervention helps carers' manage medication and cancer pain

title_detail.value: Nurse-led intervention helps carers' manage medication and cancer pain

summary: The potential benefits of a new nurse-led intervention in supporting carers to manage pain medication in people with terminal cancer have been revealed in a new article.

summary_detail.value: The potential benefits of a new nurse-led intervention in supporting carers to manage pain medication in people with terminal cancer have been revealed in a new article.
